attributes.description: Thank you for your interest in our selection of used and demo vehicles currently in stock at Morgan Nissan Kimberley. Complete the form below and one of our stock specialists will be in contact with you in due course, alternatively visit us at our dealerships situated at 59 Pniel Road Kimberley. We will assistance you personally with more information, arrange finance or arrange a test drive. Trade-ins are welcome. Terms & Conditions apply.
